729670f-a.title: Richmond: Simonson Avenue - Heusden Street
729670f-a.text:
100 Simonson Avenue, west side, north of Heusden Street
(near the Staten Island Railroad tracks), showing the Mariners
Harbor Democratio Club.
April 23, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
